name: recorder
description: ðŸ“¹ Recorder | Open-source web app to record screen and camera directly in your browser | No installation required | No tracking | Fully local | ðŸš€
readme_summary: Recorder is an open-source, privacy-focused web application that allows users to record their screen and/or camera directly within their browser. It requires no installation and processes all recordings locally, ensuring user privacy.
primary_use_case: To provide a simple, private, and accessible tool for users to record their screen and webcam directly in their browser without any software installation or data tracking.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, stylized robot holding a digital camera and a screen capture icon, standing in front of a glowing, transparent browser window. The robot is simultaneously projecting a small webcam feed into a corner of the browser window (picture-in-picture) and capturing the main browser content. Subtle digital particles flow from the screen and camera into the browser window, representing the recording process. The background is clean and modern, with the 'Recorder' name subtly integrated into a digital interface element. The overall mood is helpful and accessible, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with bright, inviting colors.

name: IC-Custom
description: [Arxiv'25] IC-Custom: Diverse Image Customization via In-Context Learning
readme_summary: IC-Custom is a Python-based repository for diverse image customization, enabling users to modify images based on reference images and target descriptions. It supports both position-aware editing (like product placement and virtual try-on) and position-free customization (like IP creation).
key_features: Masked customization for specific categories (bags, perfumes, clothes, rigid objects)
primary_use_case: Enabling users to perform diverse and flexible image customization tasks, from precise object placement to creative IP generation, using in-context learning.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist standing before a large, blank canvas, holding a magic wand. The wand casts a beam of light onto a reference image of a handbag, transforming it into a new, stylized handbag that seamlessly integrates into a fashion magazine cover displayed on the canvas. Small, glowing icons representing 'segmentation mask' and 'text description' float near the artist's hand. The background is a clean, modern studio with subtle UI elements showing the repository name 'IC-Custom'. The overall mood is creative and inspiring, rendered in a vibrant 3D isometric illustration style with clear, crisp details.

name: pg_activity
description: pg_activity is a top like application for PostgreSQL server activity monitoring.
readme_summary: pg_activity is a command-line tool that provides real-time monitoring of PostgreSQL server activity, similar to the 'top' command for system processes. It displays active queries, connection statuses, and resource utilization, helping users identify performance bottlenecks.
key_features: Real-time monitoring of PostgreSQL server activity
Displays active queries, connection statuses, and resource utilization
Provides options for filtering and outputting data (e.g., CSV)
Degraded mode for limited user privileges
primary_use_case: Monitoring and diagnosing PostgreSQL performance issues in real-time through a command-line interface.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant lighthouse keeper standing at the top of a lighthouse, using a powerful telescope to scan a vast, stormy sea filled with numerous ships. The telescope's beam highlights specific ships that are struggling or moving erratically, representing problematic PostgreSQL queries. Small, glowing data streams flow from the sea towards the lighthouse, symbolizing the monitoring data. Subtle UI elements resembling a terminal window are visible on a console near the keeper. The scene is set at dusk with dramatic lighting, emphasizing the importance of the keeper's watch. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration with clear, bold lines and a color palette of deep blues, grays, and glowing oranges for emphasis.

name: reddix
description: Reddix â€“ Reddit, refined for the terminal.
readme_summary: Reddix is a terminal-based client for Reddit, written in Rust, that enhances the browsing experience with features like image previews, video playback, and keyboard-first navigation. It aims to provide a refined and efficient way to interact with Reddit content directly from the command line.
key_features: Image previews based on the kitty graphics protocol
Video playback via mpv's Kitty integration
Gallery browsing with inline navigation controls
primary_use_case: Browsing and interacting with Reddit content directly within a terminal environment.
cover_image_prompt: A cozy, dimly lit study room at night. A person is comfortably seated at a vintage wooden desk, illuminated by the soft glow of a single desk lamp. Instead of a traditional monitor, a sleek, modern terminal window is open, displaying a vibrant, organized feed of Reddit posts. The terminal screen shows small, inline image previews and video thumbnails, seamlessly integrated. Floating around the terminal are subtle, glowing data particles, representing the fetched Reddit content. The repository name 'Reddix' is subtly etched into the side of the desk. The overall mood is one of focused productivity and refined digital exploration. The art style should be a 3D isometric illustration with a warm, inviting color palette and clean, detailed rendering.

name: wppconnect
description: WPPConnect is an open source project developed by the JavaScript community with the aim of exporting functions from WhatsApp Web to the node, which can be used to support the creation of any interaction, such as customer service, media sending, intelligence recognition based on phrases artificial and many other things, use your imagination
readme_summary: WPPConnect is an open-source Node.js library that exports WhatsApp Web functionalities to the Node.js environment. It enables developers to build custom interactions, automate tasks, and integrate WhatsApp into various applications, such as customer service bots and AI-powered messaging systems.
key_features: Send text, image, video, audio, and docs
Get contacts, chats, groups, group members, Block List
primary_use_case: Automating WhatsApp interactions and building custom applications that leverage WhatsApp messaging capabilities.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly robot assistant, with subtle WhatsApp chat bubbles floating around it, is acting as a bridge between a vast digital network and a user's hand holding a smartphone. The robot is efficiently sorting and directing various types of messages (text, images, documents) represented by glowing icons. In the background, a stylized representation of the WhatsApp Web interface is visible on a monitor, with lines of code subtly integrated into the digital network. The scene is bright and modern, with a clean, 3D isometric illustration style, emphasizing connectivity and automation. The WPPConnect logo is subtly placed on the robot's chassis.
